Get the best out of your tools and agents with Deltastring

Unleash your Zendesk

Book a chat

Don't Pay Agent Salaries for Robot Work

The best processes get out of the way of productivity

Are your agents constantly flipping between second—even third—screens? Their routine of endless ctrl-c and ctrl-v is a productivity sink, wasting time and efficiency just to get data where it needs to be.

We streamline that process. Our Zendesk integrations and automation solutions connect your Zendesk directly to the systems responsible for decision-making. No more manual data wrangling, just pure, efficient workflows that power your business.

Agents forget they are navigating Zendesk but instead just see themselves as talking to customers, solving problems. Explore our comprehensive resources or book a meeting with us and see efficiency transformed.


Book a chat

Services

Zendesk migrations, automations, integrations, applications.

Migrate

Seamless Zendesk migration services from legacy systems with zero data loss and minimal downtime. Expert planning and execution for enterprise transitions.

Integrate

Custom Zendesk integrations connecting your customer service platform with CRM, billing systems, and business tools. Eliminate manual data entry.

Automate

Customer experience automation that frees your agents from repetitive tasks to focus on complex problem-solving and better customer outcomes.

Develop

Bespoke Zendesk applications that extend platform functionality with custom features tailored to your specific business requirements.

About Us

The boutique Zendesk agency

Our founders started their journeys in ownership and management of hospitality and retail franchises, so we know how it is to provide premium service on an inelastic budget. We’ve talked the talk and walked the walk, with multiple industry awards, extensive internal and external recognition for business units under our leadership.

We’re based in the Southampton area, giving us easy in-person access across the South, including London and Bristol. Now in our third year operating under the Deltastring brand, we’ve got the experience to get the job done combined with the flexibility to align our processes to your needs.


Now tell us about you!

Timeline

The Deltastring story

  • 2016-2019

    Our predecessor business makes forays into CX

    Nico sets up and operates his first company, rethinking hospitality with data-led process iteration, while Rosie is an experienced senior manager from the world of retail.

  • 2019-2021

    Learning Zendesk, focusing on actionable insights

    We turn our attention to Zendesk, talking our learnings from the restaurant world to streamline and simplify the agent experience.

  • 2022

    Data and engineering

    Following a project with a data engineering team, combining this with previous chatbots and API integration setups leads to our first Zendesk applications.

  • 2023-2025

    End-to-end projects with enterprise clients

    Our bread-and-butter has been these complete deployment processes for enterprise clients looking to switch to Zendesk or rethink their Zendesk approach.

  • TODAY

    Expanding our services, growing our team

    Deltastring do Zendesk migrations, automations, integrations, applications. We’re looking to a future where businesses of all scales require intelligent systems.
